articles.title: Jersey Shore House Parties Spreading Coronavirus to Pennsylvania, Officials Say - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Eleven new cases of COVID-19 in one Pennsylvania county have been traced to exposure to Jersey Shore beach house parties.
articles.content: New cases of COVID-19 in Pennsylvania have been traced to people attending house parties at the Jersey Shore, officials said. The Bucks County Health Department in suburban Philadelphia has reported … [+776 chars]
